a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of total government spending by purpose of government activity. Categories are based on the
Classification of the Functions of Government (COFOG).

Note: Data for
general government
, which includes central, state, and local governments and social security funds. For the US, environmental
protection spending is included in "Housing and community amenities" and "Economic affairs."
